ğŸš€Discover the latest additions to the Microsoft Flight Simulator marketplace this week and at the flying experience. This week a lot of new packages including new ones from Asobo/Microsoft. But probably the one everybody has been waiting for is the PMDG 777-200ER which comes with the default house livery only. However there is some good news because also multiple livery packs for this aircraft are now available in the store. If you prefer smaller aircrafts then have a look a Carenado's CT210N which is a very detailed general aviation aircraft.
